P02:
The ‘T’ logo type, symbolizing Virtual, Art, and Clean, the three representative axes of Tritech’s business area, is future-oriented and 
The business logo was concretized by interpreting it in a fast-paced atmosphere.
The gradient color of Peacock (turquoise) + Navy Blue (dark blue) creates an ever-changing and trustworthy atmosphere.
